Since August 21, 2012 I now know Counter Strike Global Offensive...
Before i played it here on Steam I played it on the XBOX 360 and the game is still one of my Favorite Games i ever played! ❤️

It developed to a great competition game and the graphics also went better and better!
We all have nostalgia from the times we played with old friends and also now our new.
Thanks for the great game and the great time i could spend playing in fun and happiness...
Thank you so much... ❤️
